A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
There were a few magical moments. But every time there was something dramatic\, it undercuts itself.

The overall plot makes no sense. Formerly deep characters are flattened to 1 dimension.  There is no reason for this mess to be as bloated as it is.

Disney went from promising in Force Awakens\, to puzzling in Rogue One\, to making me think they are trolling the fans in Last Jedi.

I will continue to watch these movies...I am a sucker. But it's not with any joy.
